text: Mankato is a city in Blue Earth and Nicollet counties of Minnesota in the United States. It is the county seat of Blue Earth County. About 44,500 people were living in Mankato as of 2020. It can be found by the Minnesota River where it meets up with the Blue Earth River. It has a sister city called North Mankato. The city of Skyline can be found inside of Mankato. == References == == Other websites == * ci.mankato.mn.us â€” City of Mankato Category:Cities in Minnesota Category:County seats in Minnesota Category:1852 establishments in the United States Category:1850s establishments in Minnesota Territory
title: Mankato, Minnesota
